branchCategory.name: XM and XY
branchCategory.description: Series XM (high vacuum angle valve) and XY (high vacuum in-line valve) feature body materials of SUS (stainless steel). The structure of the XM is the same as the XL, except the body material of the XL is aluminum. The XM series is interchangeable with the XL series. The precision cast, one piece manufacturing process of the XY series prevents imperfections due to accumulation of gas and ensures no porosity in the body.

branchItem.name: XM and XY, High Vacuum Valves, Stainless Steel, Angle and In-line Types
branchItem.description: Series XM (high vacuum angle valve) and XY (high vacuum in-line valve) feature body materials of SUS (stainless steel).
